      • generateServerData

        public java.lang.String generateServerData(java.lang.String username,
                                           java.lang.String challenge,
                                           Notary notary)
        generateServerData

        %%% BEGIN SOURCE CODE %%% 

                  String dataToSign = org.apache.commons.codec.binary.Base64.encodeBase64URLSafeString(("" + System.currentTimeMillis()).getBytes()) + "."
                                + org.apache.commons.codec.binary.Base64.encodeBase64URLSafeString(username.getBytes()) + "."
                                + org.apache.commons.codec.binary.Base64.encodeBase64URLSafeString(challenge.getBytes());
                String signature = notary.sign(dataToSign);

                return org.apache.commons.codec.binary.Base64.encodeBase64URLSafeString((signature + "." + dataToSign).getBytes());
        %%% END SOURCE CODE %%%

      • constructPolicy

        public Policy constructPolicy(java.lang.String[] acceptedAaids)
        constructPolicy

        %%% BEGIN SOURCE CODE %%% 

                  if (acceptedAaids == null) {
                        return null;
                }
                eu.recred.fido.uaf.msg.Policy p = new eu.recred.fido.uaf.msg.Policy();
                eu.recred.fido.uaf.msg.MatchCriteria[][] accepted = new eu.recred.fido.uaf.msg.MatchCriteria[acceptedAaids.length][1];
                for (int i = 0; i < accepted.length; i++) {
                        eu.recred.fido.uaf.msg.MatchCriteria[] a = new eu.recred.fido.uaf.msg.MatchCriteria[1];
                        eu.recred.fido.uaf.msg.MatchCriteria matchCriteria = new eu.recred.fido.uaf.msg.MatchCriteria();
                        matchCriteria.aaid = new String[1];
                        matchCriteria.aaid[0] = acceptedAaids[i];
                        a[0] = matchCriteria;
                        accepted[i] = a;
                }
                p.accepted = accepted;
                return p;
        %%% END SOURCE CODE %%%

        This function creates the server policy

        REGreq 1.2.1.1.3

        AUTHreq 1.2.1.1.3

        Parameters:
        acceptedAaids -
        Returns:
        See Also:
        Policy, MatchCriteria
